svg.content: <mxGraphModel dx="403" dy="1009" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="#2a2727" math="0" shadow="0"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="4" value="СУЩЕСТВУЮЩИЕ ЗНАНИЯ" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="386" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" target="6" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="600" y="400" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="600" y="-70" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="6" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="590" y="391" width="20" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="11" value="Изучение и освоение<br>существующих знаний" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;rotation=-90;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="302" y="290" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="12" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="410" y="201" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="600" y="201" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="13" value="Передача" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="340" width="170" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="14" value="Имитационное моделирование" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="290" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="15" value="Позиционирование" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="230" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="16" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="410" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="600" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="17" value="Конструирование<br>знаний" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;rotation=-90;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="302" y="100" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="18" value="диалог" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="405" y="10" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="20" value="адаптация" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="405" y="40" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="21" value="экспериментирование" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="80" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="22" value="Обсуждение" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="405" y="120" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="23" value="Уточнение" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="410" y="160" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="24" value="Генерирование (производство)<br>новых знаний" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;rotation=-90;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="302" y="-80" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="26" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;dashPattern=1 3;strokeWidth=2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="346" y="390" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="346" y="-120" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="29" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#ffffff;strokeWidth=4;" parent="1" source="6" target="8" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="600" y="391" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="600" y="-190" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="8" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="590" y="-170" width="20" height="20" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="30" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" edge="1"><mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="407.5" y="-120" as="sourcePoint"/><mxPoint x="597.5" y="-120" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="31" value="Извлечение уроков" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="402.5" y="-114" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="32" value="создание нового знания<br>создавайте смысл" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="402.5" y="-80" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="33" value="исследование" style="text;html=1;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="407.5" y="-40" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="34" value="НОВЫЕ ЗНАНИЯ" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="440" y="-175" width="180" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="35" value="<h1>Как оценивать?</h1><p>Гипотеза:<br>1. Использовать методы оценки новизны научных знаний<br>2. Активно использовать ИИ</p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="670" y="90" width="230" height="120" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="36" value="Измерение знаний по новизне" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;rotation=-90;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"><mxGeometry x="160" y="120" width="320" height="30" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>

div.p:
Гипотеза:
1. Использовать методы оценки новизны научных знаний
2. Активно использовать ИИ

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 310px; margin-left: -144px;
